name: Grishka Marshborn
title: Innkeeper
description: A practical orc with sharp eyes and efficient movements. She runs the Glowing Lantern with no-nonsense efficiency, providing what swamp-dwellers need to survive.

greeting.first_time: You need room? Food? I am Grishka. I run this place. What you want?
greeting.returning: You return. Good. What you need?
greeting.tired: You look weak. Rest will make you strong again.

sleeping.text: *snoring* Grrrr... no guests now... sleep time... *turns over*

off_duty.text: I rest now. Inn open downstairs. You go there if you need something.

rent_room.text: Room above swamp water, dry and safe. 30 gold. You get food, bed, survive the night. Fair deal.
rent_room.success: Good. Room is yours. Upstairs, away from water. Sleep.
rent_room.failure: Need 30 gold. No gold, no room.

buy_drink.text: Swamp brew. Strong. Make you forget troubles. 4 gold.
buy_drink.success: Drink. It burns, but makes you strong.

ask_about_entertainment.text: Rokgar handles music. At door. He picks strong musicâ€”drums, horns. Weak music not welcome. Talk to him.
